projects.title: ProctorX
projects.description: ProctorX is a complete end-end secure test-taking platform with all anti-cheat measures including behavioral analysis like mouse and keyboard actions used to assign risk scores to users.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: This is one of my passion projects, built using React and CSS. I really wanted to build a website and needed one for myself at the same time so this was it.

projects.title: Typing Test App
projects.description: A typing speed test app that calculates words per minute and accuracy. Developed using React and Node.js.

projects.title: Smart Living
projects.description: An AI-powered system that recommends personalized diet and exercise plans for diabetic patients in India. Built during an internship at RAPID Centre in PES University.

projects.title: Hunter Assassin
projects.description: An engaging arcade-style game called Hunter-Assasin developed using Pygame and MySQL, featuring progressive difficulty

projects.title: IPL Auction UI
projects.description: A user-friendly desktop application for conducting IPL auctions, built using Python and Tkinter.

projects.title: Python Class 11
projects.description: A collection of Python programs developed for class 11 students to help them understand the basics of Python programming.

projects.title: Python Class 12
projects.description: A collection of Python programs developed for class 12 students with a little more advanced concepts like Tkinter, MySQL, etc.

projects.title: Traffic Lights Controller
projects.description: A traffic lights controller simulation developed using Verilog

projects.title: Data Structures and Applications
projects.description: Contains programs on various data structures like linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs for junior year college Students.

projects.title: Leetcode Solutions
projects.description: My understanding and interpretation of various leetcode problems and their solutions.
